title: Kagachi-sama Onagusame Tatematsurimasu: Netorare Mura Inya Hanashi The Animation
synopsis: On the 2nd anniversary of the marriage, Takahiko realizes that he is no longer getting sexually excited with his beloved wife, Manami.
